[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.2 Scope: OGS supports product search, order management, cart functionality, delivery tracking, customer accounts, payments, and notifications.

[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.1 System Interfaces: OGS integrates with payment gateways, delivery services, and authentication systems.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.2 User Interfaces: OGS offers web and mobile apps for both customers and administrators.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.4 Communications Interfa: OGS sends notifications via email, SMS, and in-app messages for order updates.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.5 Memory Constraints: OGS optimizes storage for product data, customer orders, and delivery information.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.6 Operations: OGS supports order creation, payment processing, and delivery tracking.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.7 Site Adaptation Requir: OGS customizes interfaces and notifications based on user roles.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.8 Interfaces with Servic: OGS integrates with third-party systems for payment processing and order tracking.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.9 Interfaces with Servic: OGS integrates with third-party systems for payment processing and order tracking.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.3 MISSING-TAG2: OGS is accessible on desktops, laptops, and mobile devices using REST APIs for integration with external services.

[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.1 Purpose: The Online Grocery System (OGS) enables customers to browse, place orders, and track deliveries.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.4 Product Functions: OGS allows customers to browse products, place orders, track deliveries, manage payments, and create shopping lists.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.5 User Characteristics: OGS serves customers, supermarket managers, and delivery personnel.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.6 Limitations: OGS requires internet access for order placement, payment, and tracking.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.7 MISSING-TAG1: OGS relies on external payment gateways, delivery services, and real-time order tracking systems.

[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-001: The system shall allow customers to place orders and set delivery preferences.
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-002: The system shall integrate with external payment processors and delivery services.

[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-001: The system shall allow customers to browse products, place orders, select delivery preferences, and track delivery statuses with real-time updates. (REQ-INTF-001, REQ-DB-001, REQ-INTF-002)
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-002: The system shall provide secure payment processing, allow customers to save payment and delivery details for faster checkout, and provide real-time order updates. (REQ-INTF-002, REQ-DB-001)

[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-001: The system shall provide real-time updates on orders and delivery status within 2 seconds. (REQ-FUNC-001)

[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-001: The system shall store customer data, order history, payment details, and delivery status in a secure database. (REQ-FUNC-002)

[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-001: The system shall ensure secure authentication and data storage. (REQ-FUNC-002)

[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-001: The system shall comply with data protection regulations like GDPR. (REQ-DSGN-001)

[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-001: The system shall ensure encrypted communication for secure data transfer. (REQ-PERF-001)

[SUBSEC] 2.3 MISSING-TAG3.REQ-USAB-001: The system shall provide an intuitive UI for browsing, ordering, and tracking deliveries. (REQ-FUNC-001)

[SEC] 3. Verification: Validate order placement, payment processing, and real-time order tracking.
[SEC] 4. Supporting Information: User guides, API instructions for integration, and system setup details.
[SEC] 5. References: E-commerce best practices, food delivery system standards, and data protection regulations.
